subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Last week, the infant son of Athletics reliever Pat Neshek and his wife, Stephanee, stopped breathing. But Neshek rejoined the team and pitched in Saturday’s loss.
snippet: Last week, the infant son of Athletics reliever Pat Neshek and his wife, Stephanee, stopped breathing. But Neshek rejoined the team and pitched in Saturday’s loss.
